column2: BRIEF-Saba Capital Management Lp Reports 13.2% Stake In Royce Global Value Trust Inc As Of May 1 May 1 (Reuters) - Saba Capital Management L.P.: * SABA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LP REPORTS 13.2% STAKE IN ROYCE GLOBAL VALUE TRUST INC AS OF MAY 1 - SEC FILING * SABA CAPITAL MANAGEMENT LP SAYS ACQUIRED ROYCE GLOBAL VALUE TRUST COMMON STOCK BECAUSE BELIEVES THAT COMMON STOCK ARE "UNDERVALUED" Source text: [bit.ly/2VUmFlD] Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
